tool_description:
VoiceMaker API exposes our powerful text-to-speech engine, with a customizable voice speed, pitch, volume, pause, emphasis & voice effects. Voicemaker has 1000+ Neural AI voices including Premium, AI3, AI4 Voices.

For API Keys, Register on https://developer.voicemaker.in
Official API Docs: https://developer.voicemaker.in/apidocs
name: Voicemaker - Text To Speech API
title: Voicemaker - Text To Speech API

api_list.name: Get List of All Voices
api_list.description: Get list of All AI voices including language code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://voicemaker-text-to-speech-api.p.rapidapi.com/voice/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "voicemaker-text-to-speech-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert Text into Speech API
api_list.description: This POST API will generate Text to speech audio file.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://voicemaker-text-to-speech-api.p.rapidapi.com/voice/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "voicemaker-text-to-speech-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
